senses.sense_definition: A sport that involves exercises requiring physical strength, flexibility, balance, and coordination.

examples.text: She has been practicing <w>gymnastics</w> since she was five years old.
Rhythmic <w>gymnastics</w> is a popular event at the summer games.

senses.sense_definition: Complex and difficult mental or physical efforts, often used to describe complicated reasoning or impressive artistic skills.

examples.text: He performed some serious mental <w>gymnastics</w> to justify his mistake.
The singer amazed the audience with her incredible vocal <w>gymnastics</w>.
